DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire Consent Exemption
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient._Permission to do something._Immunity from an obligation or duty.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire Consent Exemption
Property.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient._Permission to do something._Immunity from an obligation or duty.

Concepts.longName: European Quality of Life Five Dimension Five Level Scale Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale which is used as a measure of health outcome. This instrument is a descriptive system consisting of 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activity, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 5 levels ranging from no problem to extreme problem or incapable, which are assessed by the patient.
Permission to do something.
Immunity from an obligation or duty.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task._A matter of interest or importance._The reason of something._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Relating to the study or practice of medicine._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components._A state of being, such as a state of health.

Concepts.definition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.
A matter of interest or importance.
The reason of something.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Relating to the study or practice of medicine.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components.
A state of being, such as a state of health.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task._The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).

Concepts.definition: The employees of an organization; personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task.
The act of conducting, controlling or supervising something.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An ability to understand the meaning or importance of something (or the knowledge acquired as a result).
